Posts.Content: May 14, 2013 02:38AM Gum wrote: You can add me.  I was diagnosed stage IV in January 2013.  Was stage IIb back in 2006, made it 7 years and then BAM!  I don't post much (this is actually my first), but I drop in now and then to look for info and inspiration. Heather
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? DivineMrsM kt1966
